question.name: ClinicalVisitsByRelativeVisits
question.displayName: Select a Set of Clinical Observations

columnAttribute.name: min_days_between
columnAttribute.help: Reports the minimum days between any matching observations and the observation returned

plugin.name: histogram
plugin.description: Display a histogram of the values

columnAttribute.name: num_matching_visits
columnAttribute.help: Count of the matching observations any one of which would cause this observation to be removed or retained, depending on the parameters of the search

plugin.name: histogram
plugin.description: Display a histogram of the values

question.summary: In this search, you will build a set of Observations and you can further restrict the observations returned based on the relationship of two different selected observations. You can use the wealth of data in the PRISM study to find Observations with clinically interesting patterns. More here...

question.name: ClinicalVisitsByAllData
question.displayName: Select a Set of Clinical Observations (no Relative Observations)
question.summary: In this search, you will build a set of Observations using all characteristics associated with that observation including participant and household information. You can use the wealth of data in the PRISM study to find Observations with clinically interesting patterns. More here...
